hero.title: Coffee tailored to your taste
hero.description: Discover coffee beans tailored to your unique preferences. Our intelligent platform analyzes your taste profile to deliver the perfect brew, right to your doorstep.

personalizedSelection.title: Personalized Selection
personalizedSelection.description: Our algorithm analyzes your taste preferences to recommend coffee beans that match your unique profile.

flexibleDelivery.title: Flexible Delivery
flexibleDelivery.description: Choose from weekly, bi-weekly, or monthly deliveries. Pause, modify, or cancel anytime.

alwaysFresh.title: Always Fresh
alwaysFresh.description: We roast to order, ensuring your coffee maintains optimal freshness every time.

howItWorks.title: How Coffee Subscription Works
howItWorks.description: Follow these simple steps to start your personalized coffee subscription.

profile.title: Create Profile
profile.description: Take our taste quiz to help us understand your coffee preferences.

recommendations.title: Get Recommendations
recommendations.description: We recommend coffee beans that match your taste profile.

schedule.title: Choose Delivery Schedule
schedule.description: Select your delivery frequency and customize your subscription.

enjoy.title: Enjoy Fresh Coffee
enjoy.description: Freshly roasted coffee beans arrive at your doorstep.

ethiopianYirgacheffe.name: Ethiopian Yirgacheffe
ethiopianYirgacheffe.description: Bright, floral notes with citrus acidity

kenyanAA.name: Kenyan AA
kenyanAA.description: Bold, wine-like acidity with berry notes

cart.title: Shopping Cart

empty.title: Your cart is empty
empty.description: You haven't added any items yet. Let's find some delicious coffee for you!

cart.itemsInCart: You have {count} items in your cart

testimonials.title: What Our Customers Say
testimonials.description: Thousands of coffee lovers have found their perfect coffee.

customer1.name: Young Ho Lee
customer1.content: The personalized subscription has completely transformed my morning routine. It's so much better than just ordering coffee beans!

customer2.name: Ji Su Kim
customer2.content: I love how the subscription adapts to my feedback. Each delivery brings me closer to my perfect cup of coffee.

customer3.name: Jin Hyeong Lee
customer3.content: The flexibility to pause the subscription when I travel is great. And when I return, the coffee is always fresh!

hero.title: Start Your Perfect Coffee Journey
hero.description: Discover the finest coffee tailored to your taste with our AI-powered personalization and monthly subscription service.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We aim to recommend the best coffee and tea tailored to your delicate tastes and lifestyle, helping you enjoy them conveniently through regular subscriptions. Beyond simple product sales, we want to provide an experience that adds special flavors and relaxation to your daily life.

values.title: Our Core Values
values.subtitle: The special values that Bean Bliss delivers to our customers.

personalization.title: Personalized Recommendations
personalization.description: AI algorithms analyze your preferences to recommend the perfect coffee for you.

quality.title: Premium Quality
quality.description: We use only carefully selected beans to ensure the finest taste and aroma.

convenience.title: Convenient Subscription
convenience.description: Easy setup and automatic delivery provide a hassle-free service experience.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: We use ethical sourcing and eco-friendly packaging materials for the environment.

promise.title: Our Promise
promise.description: We are committed to making your daily coffee more than just a habit, but a special moment that enriches your day. Find your perfect cup with our intelligent recommendation system.

footer.description: Personalized coffee subscriptions tailored to your taste preferences.

cta.title: Start Your Coffee Journey
cta.description: Take our taste quiz and discover coffee beans tailored to your preferences.

preferences.title: Preferences
preferences.notificationDescription: Receive notifications about shipping and orders
preferences.marketingDescription: Receive information about new products and discounts
